TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SiteCacheSettings extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides the current settings of the cache for the requested object.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool AllowLayoutPageOverrides { get; }
.property instance bool AllowLayoutPageOverrides
Public ReadOnly Property AllowLayoutPageOverrides As Boolean
public: property bool AllowLayoutPageOverrides { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether objects can override the default cache profile.
Docs.value: true if PageLayout objects can override the cache profile.

remarks.para: If both a PageLayout and PublishingWeb objects define a cache profile, the PageLayout profile is used.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool AllowPublishingWebPageOverrides { get; }
.property instance bool AllowPublishingWebPageOverrides
Public ReadOnly Property AllowPublishingWebPageOverrides As Boolean
public: property bool AllowPublishingWebPageOverrides { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Determines whether PublishingWeb objects can override the default cache profile.
Docs.value: true if PublishingWeb objects can override the cache profile.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool CbqFlushOnSiteChange { get; }
.property instance bool CbqFlushOnSiteChange
Public ReadOnly Property CbqFlushOnSiteChange As Boolean
public: property bool CbqFlushOnSiteChange { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Determines whether a cached cross-list query result is used after any object in the site has changed.
Docs.value: true if a cached cross-list query result is not used after any object in the site has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool CbqFlushOnTimeChange { get; }
.property instance bool CbqFlushOnTimeChange
Public ReadOnly Property CbqFlushOnTimeChange As Boolean
public: property bool CbqFlushOnTimeChange { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: If this is true, we will cache cross list queries for a number of seconds equal to CbqTimeToLive.
Docs.value: true if cross-list queries are cached for a number of seconds equal to CbqTimeToLive; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public int CbqMultiplier { get; }
.property instance int32 CbqMultiplier
Public ReadOnly Property CbqMultiplier As Integer
public: property int CbqMultiplier { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Multiplies how many items should be requested on a cross-list query.

remarks.para: If there are a high number of items that do not inherit permissions, this property should be set to a larger number.

MemberSignature.Value: public int CbqTimeToLive { get; }
.property instance int32 CbqTimeToLive
Public ReadOnly Property CbqTimeToLive As Integer
public: property int CbqTimeToLive { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Determines the number of seconds that the cross-list query cache in the object cache should keep query results.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool EnableCache { get; }
.property instance bool EnableCache
Public ReadOnly Property EnableCache As Boolean
public: property bool EnableCache { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Determines whether the output cache should be enabled.

remarks.para: This is the control used to turn the output cache on or off.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool EnableDebuggingOutput { get; }
.property instance bool EnableDebuggingOutput
Public ReadOnly Property EnableDebuggingOutput As Boolean
public: property bool EnableDebuggingOutput { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Determines whether debugging output is written to the response.
Docs.value: true is a comment is added to the end of the request stream stating whether the output cache is enabled, and when the cache entry was created.

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetAnonymousPageCacheProfileId (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 GetAnonymousPageCacheProfileId(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site) cil managed
Public Function GetAnonymousPageCacheProfileId (site As SPSite) As Integer
public: int GetAnonymousPageCacheProfileId(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPSite ^ site);

Docs.param: Site that the cache belongs to.
Docs.summary: Identifier (ID) of the anonymous page output cache profile for this area.
Docs.returns: An integer that represents the ID of the cache profile. This is the ID of the list item in the Cache Profiles list.

remarks.para: Determines if and how contained pages should be cached in the Microsoft ASP.NET output cache for anonymous users.

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetAuthenticatedPageCacheProfileId (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 GetAuthenticatedPageCacheProfileId(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site) cil managed
Public Function GetAuthenticatedPageCacheProfileId (site As SPSite) As Integer
public: int GetAuthenticatedPageCacheProfileId(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPSite ^ site);

Docs.param: Site that the cache belongs to.
Docs.summary: Identifier (ID) of the authenticated page output cache profile for this area.
Docs.returns: An integer that represents the ID of the cache profile. This is the ID of the list item in the Cache Profiles list.

remarks.para: This method determines if and how contained pages should be cached in the Microsoft ASP.NET output cache for authenticated users.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.SiteCacheSettings GetSiteCacheSettings (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site);
.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.SiteCacheSettings GetSiteCacheSettings(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetSiteCacheSettings (site As SPSite) As SiteCacheSettings
public: static Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::SiteCacheSettings ^ GetSiteCacheSettings(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPSite ^ site);

Docs.param: Site that the cache belongs to.
Docs.summary: Returns an object representing the site cache settings from the cache.

remarks.para: This method determines if these settings have already been retrieved, and if they have, this method uses the cached version.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsImportInProgress { get; }
.property instance bool IsImportInProgress
Public ReadOnly Property IsImportInProgress As Boolean
public: property bool IsImportInProgress { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Determines whether a content deployment import operation is currently in progress.

MemberSignature.Value: public int ObjectCacheSize { get; }
.property instance int32 ObjectCacheSize
Public ReadOnly Property ObjectCacheSize As Integer
public: property int ObjectCacheSize { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Determines how much memory should be used by the object cache.

remarks.para: The memory size is stored in megabytes (MB).
